name: TornadoGame
description:
Destroy. Grow. Have fun. 

You are playing as a tornado, roaming through wastelands, countysides, cities. 

Seems nothing can stop you. Is it? 

Anyway, release your inner will of descruction in this new game. 

Tips and Tricks:

- To get that huge cactus you have to be more then 50 ft tall

/!\ this game is in Early development /!\

Any comments will be much appreciated. 
Lets build a cool game together! 

To- do list:

- Minimap
- Levels 2-5
- Enemies (passive and active. 
Passive enemies are lakes and rives. While you are affected by water- your size and score are getting lower and lower. 
Active enemies are rainy clouds and water planes. Awoid 'em!)
